id: bigtech:absynth is back and weirder than ever after 16 years:2025-12-14T19:00:00.000Z
title: Absynth is back and weirder than ever after 16 years
author: Terrence O’Brien
summary_long: Absynth is something of a cult classic in the soft synth world. It was originally released in 2000, and quickly found an audience among the growing cadre of people making music on computers. But its last major update, Absynth 5, was released in 2009, and Native Instruments officially discontinued the instrument in 2022, citing a lack of resources to continue supporting software in desperate need of modernization. But now the Absynth is making a grand return with version six, created in collaboration with the original designer Brian Clevinger, and featuring presets from Brian Eno and Kaitlyn Aurelia Smith. Source: www.theverge.com. Date: 2025-12-14. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: space:falcon 9 launch of 29 starlink satellite from the kennedy sp:2025-12-14T18:21:00.000Z
title: Falcon 9 launch of 29 Starlink satellite from the Kennedy Space Center is on hold
author: Will Robinson-Smith
summary_long: SpaceX has put on hold its plan to launch a Falcon 9 rocket Monday morning from NASA’s Kennedy Space Center. A new launch date has not been announced. The Starlink 6-99 mission will add another 29 Starlink V2 Mini satellites to its broadband internet constellation in low Earth orbit. The company has launched more than 3,000 of its Starlink satellites so far in 2025. Source: spaceflightnow.com. Date: 2025-12-14. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.

id: bigtech:inside the high drama of the iphone 4:2025-12-14T15:30:00.000Z
title: Inside the high drama of the iPhone 4
author: David Pierce
summary_long: By 2010, the iPhone era was in full swing. Smartphones were still a new and unfinished idea - the iPhone had only just gotten copy and paste! - but it was clear that these big slabs of glass were going to change the way we did pretty much everything. Apple was also already on an annual launch strategy, so we all knew there was another iPhone coming. Source: www.theverge.com. Date: 2025-12-14. id: consumer:grok is spreading inaccurate info again this time about the :2025-12-14T20:39:47.000Z
title: Grok is spreading inaccurate info again, this time about the Bondi Beach shooting
author: Jackson Chen
summary_long: In the same month that Grok opted for a second Holocaust over vaporizing Elon Musk's brain, the AI chatbot is on the fritz again. Following the Bondi Beach shooting in Australia during a festival to mark the start of Hanukkah, Grok is responding to user requests with inaccurate or completely unrelated info, as first spotted by Gizmodo. Grok's confusion seems to be most apparent with a viral video that shows a 43-year-old bystander, identified as Ahmed al Ahmed, wrestling a gun away from an attacker during the incident, which has left at least 16 dead, according to the latest news reports. Grok's responses show it repeatedly misidentifying the individual who stopped one of the gunmen. Source: www.engadget.com. Date: 2025-12-14. Why it matters: outline likely impact on technology, business, or society. What’s next: note near-term developments or signals to watch.
